title: Large Spacious 2 BR Condo/Apt - Heat, Hot Water & Cooking Gas Included
posting_body: A Very Large Deluxe Spacious 909 Sq.

Ft. 2 BR Condo/Top Floor Corner Unit, Front Building Condo in Courtyard side, located in Lowell Off Pawtucket Blvd, Camelot Court 2 Condominium Complex with Beautiful River View/Courtyard with Very Large Total 4 Rooms, 2 Bedrooms, Excellent Wall Paint, New Stainless Steel Samsung Gas Stove / Frigidaire Stainless Steel Microwave over Gas Stove / New Full-Size Refrigerator / New Garbage Disposal / Dishwasher / Excellent Wall and Base Cabinet with Countertop / Floor plus 10' Foot Long Countertop in Dining Room with 5 Base Cabinets / Full Wall Tiles in Kitchen and Bath / 4 Total Ceiling Fans with 3 Lights each plus 2 Wall A/C each in Living Room and Master Bedroom / Hardwood Laminated Floor in every Room / 3 Sliding Glass Doors with Screen to Porch / New Tub Delta 2 Glass Sliding Doors / New Toilet, Vanity Mirror, Medicine Cabinet with Vanity Lights / All New Kitchen and Bath Faucets / All New Doors / Plenty of Storage.
This unit has an Intercom safety system with door buzzer plus Surveillance Camera in the Complex, 2 Auto stickered parking available.

Located near Highway Rts. 3, 495, UMass Lowell, Lowell General Hospital, bus/train, shopping areas (7 miles from Nashua Mall in NH State), Merrimack riverbank for Walking/Jogging/Boat Races/Music Concerts just across the street.
Rent includes heat, hot water, and cooking gas.
Available Immediately, first month, last month and security deposit.
Send me an email or text message or call me at (978) 758-6837 if you would like more information or would like to schedule a showing.
